testimonialsArray.copy:
Scott is a workhorse... he loves taking on new challenges and pours himself into his work. In my 15+ years of web development I have found few other peers who are so hard-working and determined to deliver quality results ahead of schedule.

Scott is a constant learner... whether it’s at work or on a weekend, he displays a great curiosity about new tools and technologies and loves to work toward mastering them. He is what I would consider a “unicorn” in that he not only is able to grasp more complex technical concepts, but he cares deeply about the aesthetic and UX side of web development, and his commitment to pixel-perfect work makes him extremely popular among his design partners.

Scott is by far one of the best engineers I have ever had the opportunity to work with at Capital One. I have had the pleasure of working with Scott from day one of my time at Capital One. He's the ideal teammate. He’s a team player and puts in the work and then some. He’s very easy to talk to and very understanding. Everyone loves working with him, including myself.

He’s been my go-to guy for when I needed help on a specific task and he’s always willing to help. His technical ability and his knack for solving complex problems never ceases to amaze me. He’s the ideal tech lead. He’s always open to help out when you need him, he drops everything he’s working on to help you solve your problem, and he’s a fantastic teacher. He’s been a great mentor through it all and I continue to learn from him day in and day out. I can’t wait to see what is in store for him in the future because he’s capable of anything he puts his mind to.

Scott Murphy is an honest and fair engineer. He brings ingenuity and efficiency into every project he’s a part of - whether a single page app or a large enterprise project. He’ll get it done accurately under tight deadlines while presenting potential risks to business stakeholders and correcting any hurdle that may present itself.

Scott consistently takes on challenging work that pushes the boundaries, raises concerns when / where needed, communicates up appropriately when there are constraints and is the first to jump in to help teammates. Awesome work - keep it up!
Scott was easy to work with, very open to trying alternate ideas and developing creative code options for, sometimes challenging, UI intent. His collaboration was very much appreciated.
Scott not only creates phenomenal websites / prototypes from a coding perspective, but he also has a very keen visual design eye.

specialNote: THANK YOU FOR VISITING MY SITE!
TO PUT IT SIMPLY, I LOVE TO CODE.
WHETHER I'M DOING FREELANCE WORK OR EMBEDDED INTO A PRODUCTION TEAM, I FIND GREAT JOY IN CONQUERING THE CHALLENGES OF BRINGING USER EXPERIENCES TO LIFE.
TO SEND ME A NOTE OR DROP ME A LINE.
I LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU AND PARTNERING TOGETHER IN THE FUTURE.
